messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Barbs handwriting
messages.msgSnippet: Everytime a guest comes over have them write one.  Trust me if you saw my hand writing you would be a happy camper with your own.  You would have all kinds of
messages.messageBody:
Everytime a guest comes over have them write one. Trust me if you saw my
hand writing you would be a happy camper with your own. You would have all kinds
of writing and all kinds of views on things.

Heidi


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Barbs handwriting
messages.msgSnippet: I really like that one. I m more than ready to have friends over for a party here. :-) Thanks! Barb E Happiness is a butterfly, which, when pursued, is always
messages.messageBody:
I really like that one. I'm more than ready to have friends over for a
party here. :-) Thanks!


Barb E
"Happiness is a butterfly, which, when pursued, is always
just beyond your grasp, but which, if you will sit down
quietly, may alight upon you."

- Nathaniel Hawthorne, Author




on 1/12/04 3:56 PM, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com at
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> Ask guests who come to your house to write one.
>
> That way you'll have a variety of scripts.
>
> Sandra
